Pivot table is easy to use technique of Excel. Professionals can benefit from the hidden tricks and Ninja hacks - 

  • Do's and Donts'
  • Understanding logics of the four field areas
  • Perform mathematical calculations - Sum, Average, Count
  • Perform percentage calculations - % of Row, Column, Grand total
  • Grouping Dates into months and years
  • Grouping Numbers into standard ranges such as 0-10, 11-20 etc.
  • Grouping Text into clusters such as SBUs, Zonal regions
  • Understanding new data visualisation features - Sparklines, Slicer, Charts
  • Create 100s of customised reports in under 1 minute - using special hack
  • 3 Project case studies - Sales data analysis, Closing Stock analysis, Salary & Performance analysis 
  • Essential settings
  • Introduction to PowerQuery & it's practical application

We have 21 videos of duration 1+ hrs. Through practical examples, they start from the foundation and take you to the Ninja level application. 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Your Question - Why should I take this mini-course on Excel Pivot Table?
Our Response - Because we cover the following:

  • WHEN should we use Pivot Table & what are the essential settings
  • Mathematical calculations
  • Grouping & Clustering
  • Sparklines, Slicer, Charts shortcuts and Ninja hacks

Example – Using Report Filter in Pivot Table to Generating 100s of reports in few seconds
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 
Your Question – So will I learn LookUp, Match, Sort & Filter?
Our Response – No. This course covers Pivot Table Basics to Advanced techniques
